skill.name: Scattering Cherry Blossom
skill.description:
Inflicts **280% earth attribute damage** to all enemies and inflicts **15% earth defense decrease** to the targets for **120 seconds.**

Gains **40% enhanced attack probability** increase for **3 turns** and a **50% chase damage** increase for **3 turns.**

skill.name: Ignorance Cutter
skill.description:
Deals **400% earth attribute damage** to a single enemy.

Gains **\[No Remorse]** for **1 turn**.

effect.name: No Remorse
effect.description: Damage dealt +30%, taunt all enemies, all damage received -50%. When attacked, counter-attack, counterattack can trigger enhanced attack.

resonance.name: Cherry Blossom Flash
resonance.description:
Inflicts **420%** earth attribute damage to all enemies.\
Gains **50% earth attribute attack increase** for **3 turns**, **30% counterattack damage increase** for **3 turns** and **50% chance to reset the cooldown of \[Ignorance Cutter]**.

When her HP is below 50% increase hatred value
